CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 5, 1962, pg. B6 reads:"Salute For Mrs. Polk - Mrs. Alma A. Polk, right center, enjoys the pinning ceremony which was part of the occasion that honored her at Trinity AME Church, last Sunday afternoon. Mrs. J.H. Williams, the chairman, is doing the honors, while Alice Polk and Rev. Mr. Williams look on from the left with "little" Alma and Miss Martha Tyson, right front.  The trio in back row (left to right) includes Mrs. Howard Spencer, Mrs. W.C. Hightower and Rev. M.J. Roberts, guest speaker. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, first row: Alice Polk, Rev. Williams, Mrs. J. H. Williams pinning corsage onto Alma A. Polk, "Little" Alma Polk, Martha Tyson; back row: Mrs. Howard Spencer, Mattie Hightower, and Rev. M. J. Roberts, posed in Trinity AME Church
